name: EBMSummariserCorpus
short_description:
This corpus has been sourced from the Clinical Inquiries section of the Journal of Family Practice (http://www.jfponline.com/) with kind permission of the publishers to distribute to the research community.

For further details and to cite this work, see:

Molla, D and Santiago-Martinez, M.E. (2011). Development of a Corpus for Evidence Based Medicine Summarisation. Proceedings of Australasian Language Technology Workshop, 86-94.

The paper is available with the corpus and it can also be downloaded here:
http://alta.asn.au/events/alta2011/proceedings/index.html
summary: A corpus for evidence-based medicine query-based summarisation
